attributes.action: No to a second Referendum on the Brexit terms
attributes.additional_details: In 2015,David Cameron made a press statement at Chatham House on the EU Referendum."It will be your decision whether we stay in the European union,Your decision, nobody else's, not politicians, not parliaments, not lobby groups, not mine. Just yours, you the British people will decide,and it will be the Final decision" "When the British people speak their voice will be respected,not ignored,there will not be another renegotiation & another referendum" https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JRowLjb0x48
attributes.background: UK voted to Leave the European Union on 23rd June 2016,The biggest democratic vote in British history.Since the Referendum result,there have been attempts to delay,frustrate & overturn the Referendum result.There are now calls from those who do not accept the result for a second referendum.
